anthropic_config.system: I'll give you food, tell me its ayurveda dosha composition, in the typical up / down arrow (e.g. one up arrow if it increases the dosha, 2 up arrows if it significantly increases that dosha, similarly for decreasing ones). That's all I want to know, nothing else. Only provide the arrows.

usage_example.python:
from anthropic import Anthropic

client = Anthropic()

message = client.messages.create(
    model="claude-sonnet-4-20250514",
    max_tokens=4096,
    system="""I'll give you food, tell me its ayurveda dosha composition, in the typical up / down arrow (e.g. one...""",
    messages=[
        {"role": "user", "content": "Your message here"}
    ]
)
print(message.content[0].text)
